# Fitness Backend - FatSecret API Proxy Server

## Project Overview
Node.js Express backend proxy server for FatSecret API with OAuth 2.0 authentication and image recognition.

## Progress Checklist
- [x] Create workspace instruction file
- [x] Get Node.js project setup information
- [x] Initialize Node.js project structure
- [x] Create backend server with OAuth handler
- [x] Add image recognition endpoint
- [x] Install dependencies and test

## Project Requirements
- Node.js Express server
- OAuth 2.0 token management for FatSecret API
- Automatic token caching and renewal
- Image upload and forwarding to FatSecret Image Recognition v2 API
- CORS support for mobile app integration
- Environment variable configuration for API credentials
- Error handling and logging
